Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.config

Interface UiConfig

All Superinterfaces:
org.aeonbits.owner.Config, io.cyborgcode.utilities.config.PropertyConfig, Serializable
@LoadPolicy(MERGE) @Sources({"system:properties","classpath:${ui.config.file}.properties"}) public interface UiConfig extends io.cyborgcode.utilities.config.PropertyConfig
Configuration interface for UI automation settings.

This interface is used to define and retrieve configuration properties for the UI automation framework. It uses the Config library to load values from system properties or a properties file.

Properties are loaded from:

  • System properties (e.g., `-Dbrowser.type=CHROME`)
  • Classpath properties file, dynamically determined by `${ui.config.file}.properties`
Author:

  • Method Details

    • browserType

      @DefaultValue("CHROME") @Key("browser.type") String browserType()
      Retrieves the browser type used for UI testing.

      Default: "CHROME"

      Returns:
      The browser type (e.g., CHROME, FIREFOX, EDGE).

    • browserVersion

      @DefaultValue("") @Key("browser.version") String browserVersion()
      Retrieves the browser version.

      Default: "" (empty string, meaning latest version will be used)

      Returns:
      The browser version (e.g., "114.0.5735.199").

    • headless

      @DefaultValue("false") @Key("headless") boolean headless()
      Determines whether the browser should run in headless mode.

      Default: false

      Returns:
      true if headless mode is enabled, otherwise false.

    • remoteDriverUrl

      @DefaultValue("") @Key("remote.driver.url") String remoteDriverUrl()
      Retrieves the URL for a remote WebDriver instance.
      Returns:
      The Selenium Grid or remote WebDriver URL.

    • waitDuration

      @Key("wait.duration.in.seconds") int waitDuration()
      Retrieves the default wait duration for element interactions.
      Returns:
      The wait duration in seconds.

    • projectPackages

      @Key("project.packages") @Separator(";") String[] projectPackages()

      Returns:
      The project's root package.

    • baseUrl

      @Key("ui.base.url") String baseUrl()
      Retrieves the base URL for the UI application.

      This URL is used as the root for all page navigation and resource loading within the UI automation framework.

      Returns:
      The configured base URL
